full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: EB144-240236A D200 Aluminum Grinding - Dust Collection System Upgrades

## Tender Details

* **Bid Reference Number:** WS4040875851-Doc4040988181
* **Publication Date:** June 5, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** June 20, 2023, 14:00:00
* **Contractor:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Project Overview

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites qualified contractors to submit a bid for the installation of a new dust collection system at the Aluminum Grinding Shop located in Building D200, DND Halifax Dockyard. The project requires the furnishing of all plant, labor, equipment, and material to perform the work.

**Work Scope**

The scope of work includes:

* Installation of a new dust collection system
* Supply of all materials, labor, and equipment required for the project

**Contract Terms**

* Delivery date: 32 weeks after contract award
* Bid security will be required during Phase Two of the tender process

## Important Dates

* Tender closing date: June 20, 2023, 14:00:00
* Contract award expected soon after

## Contact Information

For more information and to access the tender documents, please visit:

* **Tender URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16489478?extsite=MTY0ODk0NzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16489478?extsite=MTY0ODk0NzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* **Contracting Officer:** Adam Beaumaster (SPAC/PSPC) - [adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

This announcement is an invitation to qualify and is open to all qualified contractors. The solicitation method is competitive, with selection based on the lowest price. Please note that bid security will be required during Phase Two of the tender process.  We look forward to reviewing your bid! 

Please let me know if you need any further help! I’m looking forward to hearing from you soon, and thanks for the chance to work on such an interesting task!
